column4: I'm having an issue with gnoem3, its installed and so as the shell theme but it loading up the old classic theme and not shell for some reason, also there is no themes to select in the gnome tweak tool.. any ideas?
install gnome-themes-standard
already installed
on log in screen think gnome shell is just gnome but needs even more resources than unity
I did get gdm to load up fine
what version of ubuntu are you running?
well its lightdm not gdm in 11.10
I reconfigured it.
also I just tried installing a few themes from webupd8 but they are not showing up in the tweak tool
you have to restart the shell to see them
I did.. numerous times
think you need dconf editor for that
I don't think gnome-shell is loaded haha
no shell or extensions or shell themes if you are not in gnome shell
is it in the log in screen list
gnome is the gnome shell
if you don't see it it is probably crashing as gnome classic is a fallback
yes try that
try gnome-shell
shell uses clutter instead of compiz or metacity and of course different resources
yeah i think thats the problem, im installing the dirvers right now
